verses.content: Chuleiin, naa ei ihriethai kha ṭhahnemngaitakin ei pawisa nâwkzuol ding a nih, chuong naw chun, intawl hmang hlau rawi ei tih.
Vântirkohai hmanga thu hril hman kha a lo det a, bâwsietna le thuâwi nawna tinrênghai chun thungna feltak a hmu pei si chun,
hieng ang lâwma sandamna ropui hi inthlathlam inla, iengtin am tlân suok thei hlak ei ta? Chu Sandamna thu chu Lalpa hmanga a tîra hril a ni tah a, a hretuhai chun an mi sukdet pêk pei a.
Pathien khawmin inchiknahai le thilmakhai le, thilthawtheina tin- rênghai le, ama dit zâwng ang peia Thlarau Inthieng thil semhai le chun, anni chu a hrietpui a.
Khawvêl la hung um ding, a chanchin ei hril chu vântirkohai hnuoia chu a sie nawh,

Nisienlakhawm, mi tu amani chun khâwlai âm ani chu hieng thu hi inhriettirin a hril ta lem a: “Mihriem hi ieng am a nih a, i hriet zing hlak a na? Mihriem naupa khawm hi ieng am a nih a, i kan hlak a na?
Ama chu vântirkohai nêka inhnuoiin i siem hrih a, Ropuina le chawimawina în khumtir a, I kutsuok chungahai chun hotuah i siem bawk a;
“A ke hnuoiah iengkim i sieh a,” tiin. Chuongchun, a hnuoiah iengkim a sie leiin a hnuoia sie naw ieng- khawm a nei nawh. Amiruokchu, tuhin chu iengkim a hnuoiah umin ei la hmu hri nawh.

Nisienlakhawm, Isu vântirkohai nêka inhnuoia siema la um hri chu thina tuor leia ropuina le chawi- mawina inkhumtira umin ei hmu ta lem a nih; Pathien lunginsietna leia thîna chu mi tin ân tempêkna dingin.
A ta dinga iengkim uma, a zâra iengkim um bawk ta ding chun, nau tamtak ropuinaa a ṭhuoi lût chun, an sandamna siemtu kha tuornahai leiin sukfamkim chu a âwm hrim sih a.
A sukthiengtu le a isukthieng- hai chu an rêngin Mi pakhata suok an ni sih a; chuleiin, ama chun anni rawi chu “Unauhai,” ti ân zak nawh a:
“Ka unauhai lai i hming hril ka ta, Um khâwmhai laia chun, Hla sakin inpâk ka ti che,” tiin.
Chun, “Amaah ka ringna innghat ka tih,” a ti nâwk a. Chun, “En ta u, kei le, Pathien mi pêk naupanghai hi,” a ti nâwk bawk a.
Chuongchun, naupanghai hi tisa le thisen changtuhai an ni tâwl leiin, ama ngei khawmin chuong bawk chu a chang ve tah a; thînain thîna thuneitu (chu chu Diebol a nih), a sukbohmang theina ding le,
thîna ṭi leia dam sûnga suoka um po pohai chu a sansuok theina dingin.
A iṭhangpui hlakhai chu vântir- kohai an ni dêr si nawh a, Abraham thlahai an nih a iṭhangpui hlak chu.

Chuongchun, mihai ta dingin suol thuphachawina siempêk dingin, Pathien tieng thilhaia chun, Thiem- pu Laltak, mi lâinatthei le ringum tak a ni theina dingin, iengkima a unauhai anga hung um chu a ṭûl hrim a nih.
Ama ngei chun thlêmna tuokin a lo tuor ta leiin, thlêmna tuokhai chu a ṭhangpui thei a nih.
